languages.text: "Последнее — из-за пальбы на мостике серьезно пострадали многочисленные когитаторы и терминалы палубного контроля. На ремонт уйдет немало времени — до того часть систем корабля будет недоступна".

"And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."
languages.original_text: "Последнее — из-за пальбы на мостике серьезно пострадали многочисленные когитаторы и терминалы палубного контроля. На ремонт уйдет немало времени — до того часть систем корабля будет недоступна".

traits.locale_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire at the bridge. The repairs will take a while — and some of the vessel's systems will be unavailable until they are complete."

"And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire at the bridge. The repairs will take a while — and some of the vessel's systems will be unavailable until they are complete."

"And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

"And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

"And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

languages.text: “还有最后一件事情，舰桥遭到了攻击，许多沉思者与甲板控制终端都被损坏了。修复工作需要花些时间，在修复完成前，这艘船上的部分系统将会处于离线状态。”
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

traits.locale_text: “还有最后一件事情，舰桥遭到了攻击，许多思考器与甲板控制终端都被损坏了。修复工作需要花些时间，在修复完成前，这艘船上的部分系统将会处于离线状态。”

languages.text: «Una cosa más: los disparos en el puente han dañado numerosos cogitadores y terminales de control. Tardaremos un tiempo en repararlos y algunos sistemas de la nave no funcionarán hasta que los arreglemos».
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

traits.locale_text: «Una cosa más: los disparos en el puente han dañado numerosos cogitadores y terminales de control. Tardaremos un tiempo en repararlos y algunos sistemas de la nave no funcionarán hasta que los arreglemos».

languages.text: "Und noch eine letzte Sache. Zahlreiche Cogitatoren und Deckskontrollterminals wurden durch Schüsse auf der Brücke beschädigt. Die Reparaturen werden einige Zeit in Anspruch nehmen, und einige Systeme des Schiffes werden bis zum Abschluss der Arbeiten offline sein."
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

traits.locale_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

languages.text: « Et une dernière chose. De nombreux cogitateurs et terminaux ont été endommagés par les tirs échangés sur le pont. Certains systèmes seront donc indisponibles jusqu'à leur réparation... ce qui risque de prendre un certain temps. »
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

traits.locale_text: « Et une dernière chose. De nombreux cogitateurs et terminaux ont été endommagés par les tirs échangés sur le pont. Certains systèmes seront donc indisponibles jusqu'à leur réparation... ce qui risque de prendre un certain temps. »

languages.text: 「そして最後にもうひとつ。ブリッジの銃撃戦で、多くの考算機とデッキ制御端末が被害に遭いました。修理にはしばらく時間がかかり、終了するまで船のシステムの一部はオフラインになります」
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."

traits.locale_text: 「そして最後にもうひとつ。ブリッジの銃撃戦で、多くの考算機とデッキ制御端末が被害に遭いました。修理にはしばらく時間がかかり、終了するまで船のシステムの一部はオフラインになります」

languages.text: "Son bir şey daha var. Köprüde sayısız kavramsayar ve güverte kontrol terminali, silah atışları sebebiyle hasar aldı. Onarımlar zaman alacak ve tamamlanana kadar geminin sistemlerinin bazıları çevrim dışı kalacak."
languages.original_text: "And one final thing. Numerous cogitators and deck control terminals were damaged by gunfire on the bridge. The repairs will take a while, and some of the vessel's systems will be offline until they have been completed."
